Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, helpful staff - overall a great stay”

Reviews.Content: stayed january trip 3 nights took taxi airport 57 euros 25 minute trip busy time arrive metro turn left metro station last stop line follow past rear hotel follow follow way road junction hotel sits passed right centre also right hotel decent 3 star probably inn standard better public areas rooms good size room clean two single beds desk wardrobe tv table two chairs reasonable bathroom shower hairdryer borrow reception deposit bar restaurant pleasant public spaces serve food ate dinner food good 15 20 euro also sandwiches pasta salads 6 11 euros breakfast good fruit salad cereals pastries cold meat cheese scrambled eggs bacon baked prices ok hotel 3 4 euros glass wine hotel staff polite efficient helpful fairly quiet hotel slept well good weather terrace enjoy location hotel located outskirts amsterdam catch metro central amsterdam got 24 hour ticket 7 euros metro station 15 minutes walk hotel pleasant walk daytime one would want alone late winter night taxi centre town much expensive better bet problems metro efficient service get avoid crowds central station thought hotel good value would particularly suitable arriving car large free car park could avoid cost parking central also well placed car trips coast etc intend spend days central amsterdam may better consider central hotel pay especially plan late lot hotel good value would problem staying

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and stay”

Reviews.Content: room hot since ac clean stains dust everything hair bathroom shower pressure low didnt ask different room im sure would handled complaints good things hotel metro amsterdam 10 min walk good raining staff spoke english helpful television channel english restaurant good pricey place great city trips metro cheap hotel free parking

Reviews.Title: “Spicy shower!”

Reviews.Content: stayed tulip 4 nights part group nice hotel good sized clean comfortable rooms plenty storage clean comfortable bed large clean bathroom desk small table chairs room front overlooking main road issues noise staff friendly helpful especially older members group good breakfast scrambled eggs bacon cereals fresh fruit salad bread rolls cheeses ham plenty teacoffee city centre got taxi approx bad sharing evening meals good dont mind location would recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed going concert amsterdam arena outside city didnt want travel back downtown show room bathroom quite large european standards room clean free parking huge plus amsterdam far downtown area difficult get long arent expecting 5 minute trip brought bikes downtown took hour way nice second day walked metro station 10 minutes took metro central station took 30 minutes desk staff helpful questions luxury hotel looking something little outside city good choice good price amsterdam

Reviews.Content: excellent hotel like stay away city relax atmosphere everything good except take taxi hanging late night city

Reviews.Title: “Extremely confortable rooms and well situated in av Diagonal”
Reviews.Author: STEFANIA1968
Reviews.Content: beware hotel near downtown amsterdam said state stayed hotel couple times recently business trips location hotel conveniently located near big parking lot though even one get quite full times 1 away light rail line take city center amsterdam buildings vicinity hotel visit restaurant best car available get taxi rooms quite large size roomy bathroom real problems cleanliness beds firm comfortable numerous rooms face street noise problem rooms balcony overlooking canal always locked never cared rooms also business rooms local style rather usually found outlet trying find adaptor difficult restaurant food evening good la carte set offering best deals restaurant also frequented guests breakfast mix continental american style local touch beware upon recent trips almost every morning tour group chinese tourists hotel every morning hotel staff paying attention groups seperate area set aside breakfast became rather full breakfast area service apart single occasion got room appeared occupied member hotel staff havent run problems return customer checkin fast filled upon last checkout staff surprised aware would return 3 weeks later another 2 weeks hotel business costs company rate hotel costs hotels downtown plus parking free

Reviews.Title: “A hotel I would stay at again”
Reviews.Author: Londongirl19
Reviews.Content: group visiting amsterdam nightlife clean friendly hotel metro 10 minute walk coming back cab 20 minutes 35 euros room spacious clean beds good breakfast excellent employees always friendly would recommend

Reviews.Title: “Big, modern and comfortable room”
Reviews.Author: SMMSBR
Reviews.Content: hotel acceptable however location terrible certainly located stones throw away anything except perhaps see hotel window way get train station walk deserted street approximately mile hotel one side park side walk takes 20 minutes option buses run block cab companies come take train station get train station 20 minute ride centraal station hotel centrally located anything hotel service acceptable breakfast served morning eggs breads meats cheeses hotel room clean hotel grounds would never stay though since location terrible far unsafe train bus station

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful rooms, excellent location.”
Reviews.Author: Travelguy0
Reviews.Content: stayed last week 6 year old rate room per night booked online room good size clean bed really comfortable hotel provided extra bed son comfortable without asking also supplied additional towels room comes minibar room store breakfast hotel last day days wanted get explore soon got food excellent great choice staff helpful accommodating hotel ideally located short walk metro bus tram ideally placed barcelona camp stadium front desk extremely helpful knowledgeable pointed us right direction occasion also provided excellent recommendations local restaurants great stay hotel highly recommended enjoy stay

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for business”
Reviews.Author: EricGu
Reviews.Content: stayed four nights hesperia presidente explore barcelona family really recommend hotel 20 minute walk la sagrada familia old town ramblas also plenty busses running outside hotel parts town taxi cheap reviewers pointed bathroom isnt private traveling family problem us breakfast super lots different choices form fruit pastries dont ask great scrambled eggs

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, Convenient for a business trip to Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: dysphorichousewife
Reviews.Content: overall pleasant experience concern shower private hence suitable colleague ac functioning warm air despite hot weather day time end would say nice hotel despite minuses still good planning short stay barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms, the bar seems to close a little early. Noisy on the front”
Reviews.Author: extracover
Reviews.Content: agree reviews pretty good location checked evening morning didnt require use amenities free wifi nice nice sitting area view good customer service warning room shower adjacent bedroom separated tiles way shower wasnt private sharing room somebody dont want see shower might place also door toilet glass didnt quite close way privacy might problem also little pricey seemed par cost hotels arriving airport take train sants transfer 27 bus quick easy trip airport

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: Jh_globe_trotter
Reviews.Content: writing review right hesperia hotel part nh chain considered 4 stars start positive points fast checkin nice appointed room sitting area nice lcd free wireless internet everywhere clean room big enough comfy bed well located middle shopping area varied tasty breakfast negative points little outdated need refurbishment would tend say good 3 stars little pricey comfort offered paid 150 e single use pay per view channels tv noisy heating internet poor choice minibar bathtub shower recommend though price

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: AnaVaju96
Reviews.Content: lucky find hotel literally last minute booked bb around corner find upon arrival exist hour walking around late night hesperia presidente suggested us luckily room available us rooms spotless spacious complaint would make toilet door made glass therefore could hear exactly friend problems breakfast terrific wide things choose staff always helpful kind although hotel centre easily get taking regular buses may also take tourist hop buses stop around corner pleasant time hesperia presidente would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful hotel at a very reasonable price.”
Reviews.Author: Pamela52
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 days rooms clean comfortable bed bathroom good size comfortable see people shower main room bus stop right front hotel metro stop 10 min walk plenty restaurants around area 15 min main action las ramblas staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Awful stay”
Reviews.Author: Raskolnikov65
Reviews.Content: hotel well located offers great value money staff friendly helpful collected beautiful breakfast tray sick friend asked could take breakfast definitely consider staying barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay at the Hesperia Presidente Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: mshbnyehud
Reviews.Content: stayed business good reasonable hotel thats quick stroll subway ever want go city bed comfortable business didnt really need much amenities sink wouldnt drain first got quick call solved problem although left around bathroom floor bit annoying bit main tourist areas noisy around hotel would stay next time visit complaint wifi internet room although free extremely slow made working room difficult

Reviews.Title: “Very good value in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: JakieJr
Reviews.Content: hotel located busy main road handy get main shopping streets restaurants minutes lovely large bedroom huge beds great space move around friendly staff reception

Reviews.Title: “Another Term for Presidente”
Reviews.Author: AdrenalineOne
Reviews.Content: first trip barcelona october loved city plenty see hotel clean staff friendly fabulous location little bit walk beach really worth room larger expected wonderful views bed incredibly comfortable king size know people fault place use key card put lights ridiculous would recommend hotel city heartbeat wait return please note want see amazing architecture get early queues particular sagrada familia long

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for business travelers”
Reviews.Author: crazy4nature
Reviews.Content: outside building reception look fine rooms basic could call 4 star 3 star fair location wise quite away centre even closest metro quite walk wouldnt use metro late night walk back hotel meal central restaurant quite distance cover overall job clean rate high quality rooms ok

Reviews.Title: “Very good location!!!”
Reviews.Author: jpgjpg
Reviews.Content: staff reception small slow elevators big rooms modern even 8 floor still large check shower instructions time reception ok bar first floor ok fresh cooked wanted general clean modern hotel good location downtown

Reviews.Title: “recommended this hotel but a long walk to the central”
Reviews.Author: c0zyc0rner
Reviews.Content: im staying hotel right enjoying everything visit barcelona except hotel checkin staff helpful someone stayed hotel spain walked room could turn lights apparently must key card work light switches would great someone told checked called hotel staff annoyed know minutes later went back lobby ask question waiting 15 minutes behind one couple chatting go front desk person asked could help asked adapter forgot mine right away said somewhere else may find one asked el corte ingles closed returned room use computer free wireless required password must secured front desk back 11 floors ask unfortunately system said front desk person call hour later called password point 11 pm bed trying sleep easy walls hotel thin hear everything room next housekeeping staff quite early moving furniture running around making noise room pretty small though view nice bathroom ok bring soap one bar sink shower one shower bath water floor love barcelona disappointed hotel would recommend

Reviews.Title: “No way 4 star”
Reviews.Author: Karbaby
Reviews.Content: clean relatively new modern staff polite courteous willing assist reception staff particularly accomodating helpful however floor everytime shower shower door properly door closing opposite direction problem rooms las ramblas important part visit barcelona hotel way far ended using taxis time

Reviews.Title: “Research Paid Off!”
Reviews.Author: midpengirl
Reviews.Content: first impressions great easy checkin combined extremely friendly staff stayed floor requested quiet room perfect views great could see gaudi room room immaculate spacious bed extremely comfortable bathroom spacious clean location hotel great 10 minute bus ride la rambla area great next door overall absolutely stay would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Good all round choice”
Reviews.Author: Scousie
Reviews.Content: recently nice holiday barcelona chose stay presidente first stayed many different great hotels travel business leisure trip basically hotel exactly wanted 2 us reception really welcoming even helped carry bags room offered big spacious free internet staff overall excellent 11 days also gym ex fitness definitely say even though fitness area small everything need great work doubt location problem may go back far away main metro stations come visit barcelona times going visit dont think mind walking back big issue times take recommend anyone chose stay hotel unless like hate waking back forth metro good walk 4 times day rush could luck thank staff wonderfull stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, okay location”
Reviews.Author: JonNL
Reviews.Content: traveled world chance stay great hotels booked hotel stay family 10 days looking nice place clean safe good value great value well located 15 minutes airport place middle great shopping area rooms well priced took 2 rooms us 2 teenagers great idea rooms corner floor service perfect every day slept well showers fantastic staff professional friendly free wifi every rooms go go go

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: DanielDP
Reviews.Content: stayed hesperia presidente nights july absolutely delighted standard spotlessly clean every area serviced daily tea coffee welcoming nothing much trouble breakfast wonderful huge choice freshly cooked order staff friendly made us feel welcome never stayed hotel like clean friendly good room comfy showers really complaints definitely staying next year

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: JREV-ODE
Reviews.Content: really nothing wrong hotel location bad room good stayed cruise different hotel cruise family 3 would liked bigger room pull sofa bed didnt feel comfortable keeping window curtains open literally next apartments could see windows could see call taxi needed go cruise avoid walking across street suitcases young child costs extra 3 euros called hotel hotel stayed taxi lane right front hotel barcelona areas cab always like market nearby case need supplies one located 2 blocks away free wifi internet available even room signal weak inside room nice one universal adapter available room

Reviews.Title: “Que encantada!”
Reviews.Author: TessM
Reviews.Content: queen size bed confortable room perfect nothing add perfect personnel helpfull professional breakfast quite expensive cents two even huge good fresh breakfast much every morning free fast internet connections guests

Reviews.Title: “Clean, stylish rooms, modern, good location for exploring the city”
Reviews.Author: JatandGst
Reviews.Content: four us stayed hesperia presidente long weekend pleased standards rooms modern spotlessly clean breakfast staff friendly welcoming times good choice one wed choose return visit

Reviews.Title: “NIce hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ireland9
Reviews.Content: hotel look tasteful outside especially barcelona standards room beautifully decorated size almost twice previous room elsewhere barcelona price lots mirrors ladies bed super comfy shower three space huge staff friendly competent everybody spoke fluent english able check 10am got prompt help 3am located safe neighborhood near fab restaurants inexpensive grocery stores hotel bit far away metro many buses steps away take buses tofrom airport close windows sleep want hear noises club across street night

Reviews.Title: “Good all round choice”
Reviews.Author: turbovoyager
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel get good deal really worthwhile rate euro per night double room breakfast additional 19 euro staff checkin friendly although takes passport etc free wifi internet feel basic business travel get code front desk room 12th floor spacious bed excellent even extra space sit relax seperate huge shower figure works fantastic plenty guest amenities including first time saw hotel downside maintenance door toilet kept slamming locks fixed place shower cap furthermore tv remote didnt work well anymore windows rooms open let fresh air great also plenty power sockets plug smart phones laptops travel even though breakfast extremely high price quality great good juice excellent coffee machine plenty choices bread cold cuts etc im sure eggs surrounding streets plenty bars berlin right across hotel lobby serve good drinks tapas likely stay prices reasonable breakfast price go though

Reviews.Title: “We liked it”
Reviews.Author: stromkr
Reviews.Content: staying february 2011 february 2010 nights business hotel much better used stay barcelona previous years rooms clean spacious well arranged great comfortable bed although location exactly center convenient gives easy access main parts city nice bars restaurant around service good highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Room is small, bed is comfortable, shower is great, no pool”
Reviews.Author: Mousers
Reviews.Content: spent three nights march features required good trip comfortable bed nice shower desk free wifi although didnt work first night alot electrical outlets clean quiet room mirror blow dryer good location bar seems close early others mentioned many good restaurants bars within block hotel hotel also close wonderful stores time shop didnt check gym business center even sure one

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommended”
Reviews.Author: fi0naS
Reviews.Content: good rooms nice staff room key sometimes real pain 8th floor room facing road extremely noisy thursday night people leave establishment around corner 4 however nice place

Reviews.Title: “Good Business Hotel”
Reviews.Author: prospero1b
Reviews.Content: excellent location rooms modern well maintained although hotel main street rooms well isolated hotel staff helpful although particular requests hotel good value money

Reviews.Title: “What a great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: roach0909
Reviews.Content: stayed junior suite room nice service disappointing though staff hardly understood english werent helpful

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel - Slightly out of the main areas”
Reviews.Author: glitterkitten
Reviews.Content: stayed party six three couples hotel rooms spacious clean bathrooms great really large showers plenty hot enormous comfortable couple satisfied room staff friendly polite helpful giving directions hotel main tourist breakfast good wasnt keen eating times snacks found pricey bar nice quiet wonderful time hesperia wouldnt hesitate return

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with Great Service”
Reviews.Author: OAPRomford_Essex
Reviews.Content: first class hotel city centre location quiet hotel spacious rooms excellent facilities bed huge bathroom amazing one best showers ever seen buffet breakfast superb lots choice fresh presented staff helpful incredibly polite food times great many great eating places nearby need eat th hotel got great offer travelzoo value brilliant

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: WisconsinTravler5
Reviews.Content: good overall visit hesperia presidente barcelona good location perfect barcelona excellent system buses right outside door buy day passes less 6 euros gives unlimited rides hotel clean hotel room carpets tv screen lcd smallish adequate room working space best free wifi good gym great youll able get workout plus good free weights solarium outside nice best front desk service numerous questions barcelona helpful plus theres starbucks 30 meters away need spend 15 euros breakfast hotel coffee better street

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel but could have been better”
Reviews.Author: Tottie2006
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights think fantastic went barcelona business romantic hotel well located diagonal business center close main touristic attractions short taxi ride center metro station far find restaurants near hotel staff kind breakfast enough wireless free room modern confortable facilities ive barcelona lot times think one best hotels value im sure ill come
